message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split to start.
Your 60/40 split seems a little unbalanced to me.  How about we meet closer to the middle with a 55/45 split in your favor?
Okay, Bob, I see your point. How about 58/42? It's closer to your offer, but still recognizes the time pressure we're both under.
We're running out of time, Alice. This is my final offer, let's split the difference of our previous offers and end this.
